Please make sure you\'re on the same LAN, the PC is running the server Application and your WIFI is enabled. Check that your firewall is not blocking the connection and port 9010 is to open
Welcome to the interactive help! Tap anywhere to continue to the next message.
You can see all the connected PCs listed here.
This icon turns to a warning sign, if connection to the server was lost.
Tap this button to connect/disconnect to that server.
If a server is marked as favourite, the client will try to automatically connect to during startup.
Interactive help will be shown to you, if you tap this button.
You can expand/collapse the list of located servers with this button.
You can get a download URL to the Windows component of this app.
The app can only connect to PCs those are running the Windows application.
Tapping this button will open the Volume control page.
Tapping this button will open the Shutdown control page.
Tapping this button will open the Mouse control page.
Tapping this button will open the Keyboard control page.
Tapping this button will shutdown your computer immediately.
Tapping this button will display additional options for a delayed shutdown.
You can select the time on this timepicker, when you want your computer to shutdown.
Tapping this button will launch a delayed shutdown.
This button becomes accessible, when there is a pending scheduled shutdown.
Tapping this button will abort the pending scheduled shutdown.
Tapping this button will open the volume interpolation page, where you can configure a gradual decrease of the connected PC\'s volume, before it shuts down.
Tapping and swiping on the mouse image, will move the mouse cursor on the connected PC.
The longer your swipe, the faster the mouse will move.
Tapping this button will generate a left mouse click on the connected PC.
Long-tapping this button will generate hold/release left mouse button event on the connected PC.
Tapping this button will generate a right mouse click on the connected PC.
Long-tapping this button will generate hold/release right mouse button event on the connected PC.
You can control the volume of your pc with this slider, it gets updated if volume has been changed on the connected pc.
Tapping this button will mute/unmute your pc.
You can select an ease function for a gradual decrease of volume, until the time of delayed the shutdown is reached.
You can preview the estimated volume change, based on your selected interpolation function, in this chart.
Tapping this button will launch a delayed shutdown, during which the volume will gradually decrease to 0.
Tap on the keyboard image to open up the soft keyboard.
Keys pressed on the soft keyboard will be sent to the connected pc.
